SEARCH
Package LDtk

Class Definitions

java.lang.Object
LDtk.Definitions
public class Definitions extends Object
If you're writing your own LDtk importer, you should probably just ignore *most* stuff in the `defs` section, as it contains data that are mostly important to the editor. To keep you away from the `defs` section and avoid some unnecessary JSON parsing, important data from definitions is often duplicated in fields prefixed with a double underscore (eg. `__identifier` or `__type`). The 2 only definition types you might need here are **Tilesets** and **Enums**. A structure containing all the definitions of this project
